review.reviewBody: impressed with my breakfast this morning! I tried the  Benedict and my boyfriend got a burger We both finished our whole plates and were so impressed with the quality of the food and the short amount of time it took to receive it. Our waitress was sweet and helpful. I will definitely be back!

Ginger Buzz & Vegan Veggie was deliciousðŸ˜‹Only thing, didn't expect at times to have to chew when drank Ginger Buzz  smoothie. Wasn't sure if was intentional or not
...Still had some bits in it. First time I've  ordered from here & will again.
the best cafe in east van
